credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Fisherman in Quebec, Canada
medium: Brush and black and gray wash, and white gouache, charcoal on gray-green wove paper
description: Horizontal view of a fisherman standing on a fallen tree trunk and casting his rod into a river or lake in the foreground, as a dense forest of fir trees fills the middleground at the far side of the water's bank, and a view of white clouds and distant mountains fills the background.
name: Drawing
